english_example_sentence: If the children were happy, their parents would also be happy.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы дети были счастливы, их родители тоже были бы счастливы.
turkish_example_sentence: Çocuklar mutlu olsalar, anne babaları da mutlu olur.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Çocuklar mutlu ______, anne babaları da mutlu olur.
